name: Radiation Roulette
description:
Spin for mutations as you fight off waves of mutated animals!

Radiation Roulette is a top-down fighter where you use abilities gained mutating yourself to fend off waves of enemies. Before each round, you'll have a chance to spin for as many mutations as you like. But beware, some of them may be painful...

The game is a submission for the K-State Fall 2020 Game Jam, with the theme of "no pain, no gain."

Controls:

  • Use WASD to move
  • Use the mouse to aim
  • Left Click to use your primary active mutation
  • Right Click to to use your secondary active mutation
  • Press F11 to toggle fullscreen
  • Press ESC to pause

External Assets Used:

  • m6x11 font by Daniel Linssen
